Package sep.gaia.renderer.layer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DrawableLayer
    This interface is implemented by all layer class in this application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLayer
    Implements the DrawableLayer interface and implements the add(DrawableLayer layer) method.
    BBoxDebugLayer  
    CompassAdapter
    Gets updates from GLState and calculates the compasses drawing-box.
    CompassLayer
    The CompassLayer indicates the rotation of the map in 2d mode.
    CopyrightAdapter  
    CopyrightLayer  
    GLResource
    Each drawable DataResource is prepared for OpenGL by the ResourceAdapter class.
    MarkerAdapter
    An adapter for creating the texture used to display markers as well as to calculate the GL-coordinates of the markers to be drawn.
    MarkerLayer
    The marker option save marked places persistant.
    POIAdapter
    This class receives updates about new POIs available and converts their coordinates into GL-Coordinates.
    POILayer
    For all POIs appearing on the current map section, a appropriate icon will be drawn.
    ResourceAdapter<R extends DataResource>
    Class which instances receive updates about newly available resource from a DataResourceManager.
    ScreenshotLayer  
    TileAdapter
    This class receives information about all currently available tiles and processes to fit the requirements of the TileLayer.
    TileLayer
    The TileLayer is the first layer that is drawn in GAIA.
    WeatherAdapter  
    WeatherLayer
    This layer draws the current weather information in a box in one corner of the GLCanvas.
    WikipediaAdapter
    This class receives updates about new Wikipedia-POIs available and converts their coordinates into GL-Coordinates.
    WikipediaLayer
    This layer draws "Wikipedia"-POIs symbols for all places of the current map section for which a wikipedia article exists.
